text: Dzifa Aku Attivor (22 February 1956 â€“ 15 November 2021) was a Ghanaian politician and businesswoman. She was Minister for Transport in Ghana until her resignation in December 2015. She was appointed in February 2013 by President John Mahama. Attivor died on 15 November 2021 in Accra, Ghana at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ghanaian politicians Category:African businesspeople
title: Dzifa Attivor
